00054 typedef struct hashEntry {
00055     DdNode *f;
00056     DdNode *g;
00057 } HashEntry;

00111 double
00112 Cudd_bddCorrelation(
00113   DdManager * manager,
00114   DdNode * f,
00115   DdNode * g)
00116 {
00117 
00118     st_table    *table;
00119     double      correlation;
00120 
00121 #ifdef CORREL_STATS
00122     num_calls = 0;
00123 #endif
00124 
00125     table = st_init_table(CorrelCompare,CorrelHash);
00126     if (table == NULL) return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00127     correlation = bddCorrelationAux(manager,f,g,table);
00128     st_foreach(table, CorrelCleanUp, NIL(char));
00129     st_free_table(table);
00130     return(correlation);
00131 
00132 } /* end of Cudd_bddCorrelation */

00201 static double
00202 bddCorrelationAux(
00203   DdManager * dd,
00204   DdNode * f,
00205   DdNode * g,
00206   st_table * table)
00207 {
00208     DdNode      *Fv, *Fnv, *G, *Gv, *Gnv;
00209     double      min, *pmin, min1, min2, *dummy;
00210     HashEntry   *entry;
00211     unsigned int topF, topG;
00212 
00213 #ifdef CORREL_STATS
00214     num_calls++;
00215 #endif
00216 
00217     /* Terminal cases: only work for BDDs. */
00218     if (f == g) return(1.0);
00219     if (f == Cudd_Not(g)) return(0.0);
00220 
00221     /* Standardize call using the following properties:
00222     **     (f EXNOR g)   = (g EXNOR f)
00223     **     (f' EXNOR g') = (f EXNOR g).
00224     */
00225     if (f > g) {
00226         DdNode *tmp = f;
00227         f = g; g = tmp;
00228     }
00229     if (Cudd_IsComplement(f)) {
00230         f = Cudd_Not(f);
00231         g = Cudd_Not(g);
00232     }
00233     /* From now on, f is regular. */
00234     
00235     entry = ALLOC(HashEntry,1);
00236     if (entry == NULL) {
00237         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00238         return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00239     }
00240     entry->f = f; entry->g = g;
00241 
00242     /* We do not use the fact that
00243     ** correlation(f,g') = 1 - correlation(f,g)
00244     ** to minimize the risk of cancellation.
00245     */
00246     if (st_lookup(table, (char *)entry, (char **)&dummy)) {
00247         min = *dummy;
00248         FREE(entry);
00249         return(min);
00250     }
00251 
00252     G = Cudd_Regular(g);
00253     topF = cuddI(dd,f->index); topG = cuddI(dd,G->index);
00254     if (topF <= topG) { Fv = cuddT(f); Fnv = cuddE(f); } else { Fv = Fnv = f; }
00255     if (topG <= topF) { Gv = cuddT(G); Gnv = cuddE(G); } else { Gv = Gnv = G; }
00256 
00257     if (g != G) {
00258         Gv = Cudd_Not(Gv);
00259         Gnv = Cudd_Not(Gnv);
00260     }
00261 
00262     min1 = bddCorrelationAux(dd, Fv, Gv, table) / 2.0;
00263     if (min1 == (double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00264         FREE(entry);
00265         return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00266     }
00267     min2 = bddCorrelationAux(dd, Fnv, Gnv, table) / 2.0; 
00268     if (min2 == (double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00269         FREE(entry);
00270         return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00271     }
00272     min = (min1+min2);
00273     
00274     pmin = ALLOC(double,1);
00275     if (pmin == NULL) {
00276         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00277         return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00278     }
00279     *pmin = min;
00280 
00281     if (st_insert(table,(char *)entry, (char *)pmin) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00282         FREE(entry);
00283         FREE(pmin);
00284         return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00285     }
00286     return(min);
00287 
00288 } /* end of bddCorrelationAux */
00289 
00290 
00302 static double
00303 bddCorrelationWeightsAux(
00304   DdManager * dd,
00305   DdNode * f,
00306   DdNode * g,
00307   double * prob,
00308   st_table * table)
00309 {
00310     DdNode      *Fv, *Fnv, *G, *Gv, *Gnv;
00311     double      min, *pmin, min1, min2, *dummy;
00312     HashEntry   *entry;
00313     int         topF, topG, index;
00314 
00315 #ifdef CORREL_STATS
00316     num_calls++;
00317 #endif
00318 
00319     /* Terminal cases: only work for BDDs. */
00320     if (f == g) return(1.0);
00321     if (f == Cudd_Not(g)) return(0.0);
00322 
00323     /* Standardize call using the following properties:
00324     **     (f EXNOR g)   = (g EXNOR f)
00325     **     (f' EXNOR g') = (f EXNOR g).
00326     */
00327     if (f > g) {
00328         DdNode *tmp = f;
00329         f = g; g = tmp;
00330     }
00331     if (Cudd_IsComplement(f)) {
00332         f = Cudd_Not(f);
00333         g = Cudd_Not(g);
00334     }
00335     /* From now on, f is regular. */
00336     
00337     entry = ALLOC(HashEntry,1);
00338     if (entry == NULL) {
00339         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00340         return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00341     }
00342     entry->f = f; entry->g = g;
00343 
00344     /* We do not use the fact that
00345     ** correlation(f,g') = 1 - correlation(f,g)
00346     ** to minimize the risk of cancellation.
00347     */
00348     if (st_lookup(table, (char *)entry, (char **)&dummy)) {
00349         min = *dummy;
00350         FREE(entry);
00351         return(min);
00352     }
00353 
00354     G = Cudd_Regular(g);
00355     topF = cuddI(dd,f->index); topG = cuddI(dd,G->index);
00356     if (topF <= topG) {
00357         Fv = cuddT(f); Fnv = cuddE(f);
00358         index = f->index;
00359     } else {
00360         Fv = Fnv = f;
00361         index = G->index;
00362     }
00363     if (topG <= topF) { Gv = cuddT(G); Gnv = cuddE(G); } else { Gv = Gnv = G; }
00364 
00365     if (g != G) {
00366         Gv = Cudd_Not(Gv);
00367         Gnv = Cudd_Not(Gnv);
00368     }
00369 
00370     min1 = bddCorrelationWeightsAux(dd, Fv, Gv, prob, table) * prob[index];
00371     if (min1 == (double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00372         FREE(entry);
00373         return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00374     }
00375     min2 = bddCorrelationWeightsAux(dd, Fnv, Gnv, prob, table) * (1.0 - prob[index]); 
00376     if (min2 == (double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00377         FREE(entry);
00378         return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00379     }
00380     min = (min1+min2);
00381     
00382     pmin = ALLOC(double,1);
00383     if (pmin == NULL) {
00384         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00385         return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00386     }
00387     *pmin = min;
00388 
00389     if (st_insert(table,(char *)entry, (char *)pmin) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00390         FREE(entry);
00391         FREE(pmin);
00392         return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00393     }
00394     return(min);
00395 
00396 } /* end of bddCorrelationWeightsAux */

00409 static int
00410 CorrelCompare(
00411   const char * key1,
00412   const char * key2)
00413 {
00414     HashEntry *entry1;
00415     HashEntry *entry2;
00416 
00417     entry1 = (HashEntry *) key1;
00418     entry2 = (HashEntry *) key2;
00419     if (entry1->f != entry2->f || entry1->g != entry2->g) return(1);
00420 
00421     return(0);
00422 
00423 } /* end of CorrelCompare */

00436 static int
00437 CorrelHash(
00438   char * key,
00439   int  modulus)
00440 {
00441     HashEntry *entry;
00442     int val = 0;
00443 
00444     entry = (HashEntry *) key;
00445 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8 && SIZEOF_INT == 4
00446     val = ((int) ((long)entry->f))*997 + ((int) ((long)entry->g));
00447 #else
00448     val = ((int) entry->f)*997 + ((int) entry->g);
00449 #endif
00450 
00451     return ((val < 0) ? -val : val) % modulus;
00452 
00453 } /* end of CorrelHash */

00466 static enum st_retval
00467 CorrelCleanUp(
00468   char * key,
00469   char * value,
00470   char * arg)
00471 {
00472     double      *d;
00473     HashEntry *entry;
00474 
00475     entry = (HashEntry *) key;
00476     FREE(entry);
00477     d = (double *)value;
00478     FREE(d);
00479     return ST_CONTINUE;
00480 
00481 } /* end of CorrelCleanUp */
